name: Brosh Smas
description:
It is the battle of the ages, the Cybertruck vs. the Ford F-150. In this Super Smash Bros. type game, two players control the vehicles to try and deal damage to their opponent. The more damage dealt, the farther they will be knocked back. A vehicle dies if it is knocked off the stage. The player to lose all of their lives first loses and the other player wins.

Player 1 (Cybertruck): WAD to move, S to shield, Left Shift to Attack

Player 2 (Ford F-150): Arrow Keys to move, Down Arrow to shield, Right Shift to Attack
